short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Talking Tom Hidden Bells is a free online skill and hidden object game. Find out the hidden stars in the specified images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Talking Tom Hidden Bells is a free online skill and hidden object game that features your favorite characters, Tom and Angela. Your task is to find the hidden bells in the specified images. Each level presents a new challenge with 10 hidden bells to discover, and there are 8 levels in total, ensuring plenty of engaging gameplay.

The clock is ticking, so you'll need to be quick to find all the hidden bells before time runs out. Be careful not to click in the wrong places multiple times, as doing so will reduce your remaining time by an additional 5 seconds, adding an extra layer of difficulty.

Join Tom and Angela on this exciting adventure and put your observation skills to the test. Are you ready to find all the hidden bells and complete all the levels on time? Dive into the game, enjoy the fun, and see if you can beat the clock!
